post_text: The Allentown School District offered a virtual discussion where parents had the opportunity to discuss the opening of schools for the 2020 Fall semester. Only twenty-two parents signed up for the virtual meeting, and out of those, only four parents attended. Topics addressed scheduling options for in-classroom and virtual learning options as well as COVID-19 sanitary concerns, amongst others.
